00015 #define DEFAULT_MAX_DEVICES 10
00016 #define DEFAULT_MAX_LISTENERS 10
00017 
00018 static const char* CT_CONNECTION = "connection";
00019 static const char* CTA_CONNECTION_ID = "id";
00020 static const char* CTA_CONNECTION_TYPE = "type";
00021 static const char* CTAV_CONNECTION_TYPE_HTTP = "http";
00022 static const char* CT_MAX_DEVICES = "max-devices";
00023 static const char* CT_MAX_LISTENERS = "max-listeners";

00026 static Connection** _connections;
00027 static int _connectionCount;
00028 
00029 static BOOL _logConfigured;

00031 static void listener_free(Listener* listener)
00032 {
00033     free(listener->paramUri);
00034     free(listener);
00035 }
00036 
00037 static int listener_register(Connection* connection,
00038                              Device* device,
00039                              int listenerId,
00040                              const char* paramUri,
00041                              obix_update_listener callback)
00042 {
00043     Listener* listener = (Listener*) malloc(sizeof(Listener));
00044     if (listener == NULL)
00045     {
00046         log_error("Unable to register listener: Not enough memory.");
00047         return OBIX_ERR_NO_MEMORY;
00048     }
00049 
00050     listener->paramUri = (char*) malloc(strlen(paramUri) + 1);
00051     if (listener->paramUri == NULL)
00052     {
00053         log_error("Unable to register listener: Not enough memory.");
00054         free(listener);
00055         return OBIX_ERR_NO_MEMORY;
00056     }
00057 
00058     // initialize listener values
00059     strcpy(listener->paramUri, paramUri);
00060     listener->id = listenerId;
00061     listener->deviceId = device->id;
00062     listener->connectionId = connection->id;
00063     listener->callback = callback;
00064 
00065     int error = (connection->comm->registerListener)(
00066                     connection,
00067                     (device->id == 0) ? NULL : device,
00068                     &listener);
00069     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00070     {
00071         listener_free(listener);
00072         return error;
00073     }
00074 
00075     device->listeners[listenerId] = listener;
00076     device->listenerCount++;
00077 
00078     return listenerId;
00079 }
00080 
00081 static int listener_unregister(Connection* connection,
00082                                Device* device,
00083                                int listenerId)
00084 {
00085     // we do not check listener id there because we assume that
00086     // it was checked by caller
00087     Listener* listener = device->listeners[listenerId];
00088 
00089     // call connection type specific method for removing listener
00090     int error = (connection->comm->unregisterListener)(
00091                     connection,
00092                     (device->id == 0) ? NULL : device,
00093                     listener);
00094 
00095     // free remaining listener fields
00096     listener_free(listener);
00097 
00098     // update device
00099     device->listeners[listenerId] = NULL;
00100     device->listenerCount--;
00101 
00102     return error;
00103 }
00104 
00105 static void device_free(Device* device)
00106 {
00107     if (device->listeners != NULL)
00108     {
00109         free(device->listeners);
00110     }
00111     free(device);
00112 }
00113 
00114 static int device_register(Connection* connection, int deviceId, const char* data)
00115 {
00116     // create new device object
00117     Device* device = (Device*) malloc(sizeof(Device));
00118     if (device == NULL)
00119     {
00120         log_error("Unable to initialize device object: Not enough memory.");
00121         return OBIX_ERR_NO_MEMORY;
00122     }
00123 
00124     // initialize device fields
00125     device->listeners = (Listener**) calloc(connection->maxListeners,
00126                                             sizeof(Listener*));
00127     if (device->listeners == NULL)
00128     {
00129         log_error("Unable to initialize new device: Not enough memory.");
00130         free(device);
00131         return OBIX_ERR_NO_MEMORY;
00132     }
00133     device->id = deviceId;
00134     device->listenerCount = 0;
00135 
00136     // call connection type specific device initialization
00137     // but not for the fake device
00138     if (deviceId != 0)
00139     {
00140         int error = (connection->comm->registerDevice)(connection, &device, data);
00141         if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00142         {
00143             free(device->listeners);
00144             free(device);
00145             return error;
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149     // store created device
00150     connection->devices[deviceId] = device;
00151     connection->deviceCount++;
00152 
00153     return OBIX_SUCCESS;
00154 }
00155 
00156 static int device_unregisterAllListeners(Connection* connection, int deviceId)
00157 {
00158     // we do not check device id there because we assume that
00159     // it was checked by caller
00160     Device* device = connection->devices[deviceId];
00161     int i;
00162     int retVal = OBIX_SUCCESS;
00163     int error;
00164     for (i = 0; (i < connection->maxListeners)
00165             && (device->listenerCount > 0); i++)
00166     {
00167         if (device->listeners[i] != NULL)
00168         {
00169             error = listener_unregister(connection, device, i);
00170             if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00171             {
00172                 retVal = error;
00173             }
00174         }
00175 
00176     }
00177 
00178     return retVal;
00179 }
00180 
00181 static int device_unregister(Connection* connection, int deviceId)
00182 {
00183     // we do not check device id there because we assume that
00184     // it was checked by caller
00185     Device* device = connection->devices[deviceId];
00186 
00187     // unregister all listeners
00188     int retVal = device_unregisterAllListeners(connection, deviceId);
00189 
00190     // call connection type specific method for removing
00191     int error = (connection->comm->unregisterDevice)(connection, device);
00192     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00193     {
00194         retVal = error;
00195     }
00196 
00197     // free remaining device fields
00198     device_free(device);
00199 
00200     // update connection
00201     connection->devices[deviceId] = NULL;
00202     connection->deviceCount--;
00203 
00204     return retVal;
00205 }
00206 
00207 static int device_get(Connection* connection, int deviceId, Device** device)
00208 {
00209     if ((deviceId < 0)
00210             || (deviceId >= connection->maxDevices)
00211             || (connection->devices[deviceId] == NULL))
00212     {
00213         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00214     }
00215 
00216     if (device != NULL)
00217     {
00218         *device = connection->devices[deviceId];
00219     }
00220     return OBIX_SUCCESS;
00221 }
00222 
00223 static int connection_free(Connection* connection)
00224 {
00225     if (connection->isConnected)
00226     {
00227         log_error("Can't delete open connection.");
00228         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_STATE;
00229     }
00230 
00231     // clean connection type specific attributes
00232     if (connection->comm != NULL)
00233     {
00234         (connection->comm->freeConnection)(connection);
00235     }
00236     // clean the rest of connection object
00237     if (connection->devices != NULL)
00238     {
00239         if (connection->devices[0] != NULL)
00240         {
00241             device_free(connection->devices[0]);
00242         }
00243         free(connection->devices);
00244     }
00245     free(connection);
00246     return OBIX_SUCCESS;
00247 }
00248 
00249 static int connection_create(IXML_Element* connItem)
00250 {
00251     Connection* connection;
00252     int error;
00253     // parse following parameters from the <connection/> tag
00254     int id;
00255     Connection_Type type;
00256     const Comm_Stack* comm;
00257     int maxDevices = DEFAULT_MAX_DEVICES;
00258     int maxListeners = DEFAULT_MAX_LISTENERS;
00259 
00260     // get connection id
00261     id = config_getTagIntAttrValue(connItem, CTA_CONNECTION_ID, TRUE, 0);
00262     if (id < 0)
00263     {   // error occurred and logged
00264         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00265     }
00266     if (id >= _connectionCount)
00267     {
00268         log_error("Connection id is too big: %d.", id);
00269         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00270     }
00271     if (_connections[id] != NULL)
00272     {
00273         log_error("Several <%s/> tags have the same \"%s\" "
00274                   "attribute value: \"%d\".",
00275                   CT_CONNECTION, CTA_CONNECTION_ID, id);
00276         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00277     }
00278 
00279     // get connection type
00280     const char* attrValue = config_getTagAttributeValue(
00281                                 connItem,
00282                                 CTA_CONNECTION_TYPE,
00283                                 TRUE);
00284     if (attrValue == NULL)
00285     {
00286         log_error("Settings parsing for connection id %d failed.", id);
00287         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00288     }
00289 
00290     if (strcmp(attrValue, CTAV_CONNECTION_TYPE_HTTP) == 0)
00291     {
00292         type = OBIX_HTTP;
00293         comm = &OBIX_HTTP_COMM_STACK;
00294         // initialize HTTP function stack
00295         error = http_init();
00296         if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00297         {
00298             log_error("Unable to initialize HTTP communication module (needed "
00299                       "by connection id %d).", id);
00300             return error;
00301         }
00302     }
00303     else
00304     {
00305         log_error("Wrong connection type \"%s\". Available values: \"%s\".",
00306                   attrValue, CTAV_CONNECTION_TYPE_HTTP);
00307         log_error("Settings parsing for connection id %d failed.", id);
00308         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00309     }
00310 
00311     // load optional attributes
00312     // load maximum devices count
00313     IXML_Element* confItem = config_getChildTag(connItem,
00314                              CT_MAX_DEVICES,
00315                              FALSE);
00316     if (confItem != NULL)
00317     {
00318         maxDevices = config_getTagIntAttrValue(confItem,
00319                                                CTA_VALUE,
00320                                                FALSE,
00321                                                DEFAULT_MAX_DEVICES);
00322     }
00323     // load maximum listeners per device
00324     confItem = config_getChildTag(connItem,
00325                                   CT_MAX_LISTENERS,
00326                                   FALSE);
00327     if (confItem != NULL)
00328     {
00329         maxListeners = config_getTagIntAttrValue(
00330                            confItem,
00331                            CTA_VALUE,
00332                            FALSE,
00333                            DEFAULT_MAX_LISTENERS);
00334     }
00335 
00336     connection = (Connection*) malloc(sizeof(Connection));
00337     if (connection == NULL)
00338     {
00339         log_error("Unable to initialize new connection: Not enough memory.");
00340         return OBIX_ERR_NO_MEMORY;
00341     }
00342 
00343     // init connection fields
00344     connection->type = type;
00345     connection->comm = comm;
00346     connection->id = id;
00347     connection->isConnected = FALSE;
00348 
00349     // initialize devices
00350     // we create one fake device for storing listeners of external objects
00351     // thus increase maxDevices
00352     connection->maxListeners = maxListeners;
00353     connection->maxDevices = ++maxDevices;
00354     connection->devices = (Device**) calloc(maxDevices, sizeof(Device*));
00355     connection->deviceCount = 0;
00356     if (connection->devices == NULL)
00357     {
00358         log_error("Unable to initialize connection (id %d): "
00359                   "Not enough memory.", id);
00360         connection_free(connection);
00361         return OBIX_ERR_NO_MEMORY;
00362     }
00363     // create fake device
00364     error = device_register(connection, 0, NULL);
00365     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00366     {
00367         log_error("Unable to initialize connection (id %d).", id);
00368         connection_free(connection);
00369         return error;
00370     }
00371 
00372     // call type-specific initialization of the connection
00373     error = (comm->initConnection)(connItem, &connection);
00374     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00375     {
00376         log_error("Settings parsing for connection id %d failed.", id);
00377         connection->comm = NULL;
00378         connection_free(connection);
00379         return error;
00380     }
00381 
00382     // store created connection
00383     _connections[id] = connection;
00384 
00385     return OBIX_SUCCESS;
00386 }
00387 
00388 static int connection_get(int connectionId,
00389                           BOOL isConnected,
00390                           Connection** connection)
00391 {
00392     if ((connectionId < 0) || (connectionId >= _connectionCount))
00393     {
00394         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00395     }
00396 
00397     Connection* c = _connections[connectionId];
00398     if (c->isConnected != isConnected)
00399     {
00400         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_STATE;
00401     }
00402 
00403     *connection = _connections[connectionId];
00404     return OBIX_SUCCESS;
00405 }

00407 int obix_loadConfigFile(const char* fileName)
00408 {
00409     IXML_Element* settings = config_loadFile(fileName);
00410 
00411     if (settings == NULL)
00412     {
00413         // failed to load settings
00414         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00415     }
00416 
00417     // parse config file
00418     int error = obix_loadConfig(settings);
00419     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00420     {
00421         config_finishInit(FALSE);
00422         return error;
00423     }
00424 
00425     _logConfigured = TRUE;
00426 
00427     config_finishInit(TRUE);
00428     return OBIX_SUCCESS;
00429 }
00430 
00431 int obix_loadConfig(IXML_Element* config)
00432 {
00433     // find all connection tags
00434     IXML_NodeList* connList = ixmlElement_getElementsByTagName(
00435                                   config,
00436                                   CT_CONNECTION);
00437     if (connList == NULL)
00438     {
00439         log_error("No <%s/> tags found.", CT_CONNECTION);
00440         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00441     }
00442 
00443     _connectionCount = ixmlNodeList_length(connList);
00444     if (_connectionCount == 0)
00445     {
00446         log_error("At least one configuration tag <%s/> expected.",
00447                   CT_CONNECTION);
00448         ixmlNodeList_free(connList);
00449         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00450     }
00451 
00452     // initialize connection storage
00453     _connections = (Connection**) calloc(_connectionCount, sizeof(Connection*));
00454     if (_connections == NULL)
00455     {
00456         log_error("Unable to initialize oBIX client: not enough memory.");
00457         ixmlNodeList_free(connList);
00458         return OBIX_ERR_NO_MEMORY;
00459     }
00460 
00461     // iterate through the list of <connection/> tags
00462     int i;
00463     for (i = 0; i < _connectionCount; i++)
00464     {
00465         IXML_Element* element = ixmlNode_convertToElement(
00466                                     ixmlNodeList_item(connList, i));
00467         if (element == NULL)
00468         {
00469             log_error("ixmlElement_getElementsByTagName() "
00470                       "returned something which is not an element.");
00471             // ignore and continue to the next list item
00472             continue;
00473         }
00474 
00475         // parse <connection/> tag
00476         int error = connection_create(element);
00477         if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00478         {
00479             obix_dispose();
00480             ixmlNodeList_free(connList);
00481             return error;
00482         }
00483     }
00484 
00485     ixmlNodeList_free(connList);
00486     return OBIX_SUCCESS;
00487 }

00489 int obix_openConnection(int connectionId)
00490 {
00491     Connection* connection;
00492     int error = connection_get(connectionId, FALSE, &connection);
00493     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00494     {
00495         return error;
00496     }
00497 
00498     // execute connection type specific method
00499     error = (connection->comm->openConnection)(connection);
00500     if (error == OBIX_SUCCESS)
00501     {
00502         connection->isConnected = TRUE;
00503     }
00504 
00505     return error;
00506 }
00507 
00508 int obix_closeConnection(int connectionId)
00509 {
00510     Connection* connection;
00511     int error = connection_get(connectionId, TRUE, &connection);
00512     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00513     {
00514         return error;
00515     }
00516 
00517     // unregister all devices (except zero fake device)
00518     int i;
00519     int retVal = OBIX_SUCCESS;
00520     for (i = 1; (i < connection->maxDevices)
00521             && (connection->deviceCount > 1); i++)
00522     {
00523         if (connection->devices[i] != NULL)
00524         {
00525             error = device_unregister(connection, i);
00526             if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00527             {
00528                 retVal = error;
00529             }
00530         }
00531     }
00532 
00533     // remove all listeners from fake device
00534     device_unregisterAllListeners(connection, 0);
00535 
00536     // call connection type specific method
00537     error = (connection->comm->closeConnection)(connection);
00538     if (error == OBIX_SUCCESS)
00539     {
00540         connection->isConnected = FALSE;
00541     }
00542     else
00543     {
00544         retVal = error;
00545     }
00546 
00547     return retVal;
00548 }
00549 
00550 int obix_registerDevice(int connectionId, const char* obixData)
00551 {
00552     Connection* connection;
00553     int error = connection_get(connectionId, TRUE, &connection);
00554     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00555     {
00556         return error;
00557     }
00558     if (connection->deviceCount >= connection->maxDevices)
00559     {
00560         return OBIX_ERR_LIMIT_REACHED;
00561     }
00562 
00563     // search for free slot for a new device
00564     int id;
00565     for (id = 1; (id < connection->maxDevices)
00566             && (connection->devices[id] != NULL); id++)
00567         ;
00568     if (id == connection->maxDevices)
00569     {   // this should never happen
00570         log_error("Unable to find free slot for a new device.");
00571         return OBIX_ERR_UNKNOWN_BUG;
00572     }
00573 
00574     error = device_register(connection, id, obixData);
00575     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00576     {
00577         return error;
00578     }
00579 
00580     return id;
00581 }
00582 
00583 int obix_unregisterDevice(int connectionId, int deviceId)
00584 {
00585     Connection* connection;
00586     int error = connection_get(connectionId, TRUE, &connection);
00587     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00588     {
00589         return error;
00590     }
00591 
00592     error = device_get(connection, deviceId, NULL);
00593     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00594     {
00595         return error;
00596     }
00597 
00598     return device_unregister(connection, deviceId);
00599 }
00600 
00601 int obix_registerListener(int connectionId,
00602                           int deviceId,
00603                           const char* paramUri,
00604                           obix_update_listener listener)
00605 {
00606     Connection* connection;
00607     int error = connection_get(connectionId, TRUE, &connection);
00608     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00609     {
00610         return error;
00611     }
00612 
00613     Device* device;
00614     error = device_get(connection, deviceId, &device);
00615     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00616     {
00617         return error;
00618     }
00619 
00620     if (device->listenerCount >= connection->maxListeners)
00621     {
00622         return OBIX_ERR_LIMIT_REACHED;
00623     }
00624 
00625     // search for free slot for a new listener
00626     int id;
00627     for (id = 0; (id < connection->maxListeners)
00628             && (device->listeners[id] != NULL); id++)
00629         ;
00630     if (id == connection->maxListeners)
00631     {   // this should never happen
00632         log_error("Unable to find free slot for a new listener.");
00633         return OBIX_ERR_UNKNOWN_BUG;
00634     }
00635 
00636     error = listener_register(connection, device, id, paramUri, listener);
00637     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00638     {
00639         return error;
00640     }
00641 
00642     return id;
00643 }
00644 
00645 int obix_unregisterListener(int connectionId,
00646                             int deviceId,
00647                             int listenerId)
00648 {
00649     // check connection id
00650     Connection* connection;
00651     int error = connection_get(connectionId, TRUE, &connection);
00652     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00653     {
00654         return error;
00655     }
00656 
00657     // check device id
00658     Device* device;
00659     error = device_get(connection, deviceId, &device);
00660     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00661     {
00662         return error;
00663     }
00664 
00665     // check listener id
00666     if ((listenerId < 0)
00667             || (listenerId >= connection->maxListeners)
00668             || (device->listeners[listenerId] == NULL))
00669     {
00670         return OBIX_ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00671     }
00672 
00673     return listener_unregister(connection, device, listenerId);
00674 }
00675 
00676 int obix_writeValue(int connectionId,
00677                     int deviceId,
00678                     const char* paramUri,
00679                     const char* newValue,
00680                     OBIX_DATA_TYPE dataType)
00681 {
00682     Connection* connection;
00683     int error = connection_get(connectionId, TRUE, &connection);
00684     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00685     {
00686         return error;
00687     }
00688 
00689     Device* device;
00690     error = device_get(connection, deviceId, &device);
00691     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00692     {
00693         return error;
00694     }
00695 
00696     if (deviceId == 0)
00697     {
00698         device = NULL;
00699     }
00700 
00701     return (connection->comm->writeValue)(connection, device, paramUri, newValue, dataType);
00702 }
00703 
00704 int obix_dispose()
00705 {
00706     int retVal = OBIX_SUCCESS;
00707     if (_connections != NULL)
00708     {
00709         int i;
00710         int error;
00711         for (i = 0; i < _connectionCount; i++)
00712         {
00713             if (_connections[i] != NULL)
00714             {
00715                 if (_connections[i]->isConnected)
00716                 {
00717                     error = obix_closeConnection(i);
00718                     if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00719                     {
00720                         retVal = error;
00721                     }
00722                 }
00723                 error = connection_free(_connections[i]);
00724                 if (error != OBIX_SUCCESS)
00725                 {
00726                     retVal = error;
00727                 }
00728             }
00729         }
00730     }
00731     free(_connections);
00732     http_dispose();
00733 
00734     if (_logConfigured) {
00735         config_dispose();
00736     }
00737 
00738     return retVal;
00739 }
